Hoboken.The Spiral (New York City): The Spiral is a proposed 65-floor skyscraper located in the Hudson Yards, Manhattan neighborhood of New York City. The project was announced in 2016 by real estate developer Tishman Speyer as a 1,005 foot skyscraper with 2.85 million square feet and 65 floors. The tower is being designed by Bjarke Ingels Group, the architectural firm behind West 57.
